articles.title: Europe's space agency reviewing space-based solar power - UPI News
articles.description: Solar power could be easier to harness from space, though the technology needed to beam it back to Earth is still in the developmental stage.
articles.content:
Nov. 22 (UPI) -- The European Space Agency could be tapping the power of the sun by deploying satellites that could beam the energy back to Earth, its director general said Tuesday.
